captions.text:
ITS ALMOST SAINT PATRICK’S DAY SO WATCH
OUT SNAKES! (SNAKE PROP)

IM ALEX FARNHAM AND THIS IS ANIMALIST NEWS!
DID YOU GUYS KNOW THAT SAINT PATRICKS DAY

ISN'T ONLY KNOWN FOR
LITTLE GREEN MEN WHO MAY OR MAY NOT BE DRUNK?

IT’S ALSO ABOUT SNAKES AND HOW MUCH I'M
SCARED OF THEM. (SNAKE PROP)

ST. PATRICK WAS ACTUALLY THE IRISH BISHOP
KNOWN FOR BANISHING SNAKES FROM IRELAND!

THAT’S RIGHT! LEGEND HAS IT THAT ONCE UPON
A TIME SNAKES OVERTOOK THE GREEN

HILLS OF IRELAND UNTIL ONE DAY DURING A 40
DAY FAST, THE SAINT TOOK OUT HIS MAGICAL STAFF,

WAVED IT AROUND AND BANISHED ALL THE SNAKES
TO THE SEA!
OH AND MIGHT I ADD HE WAS DRESSED IN GREEN

GREAT STORY! IT WOULD BE EVEN BETTER IF IT
WEREN'T FOR THE FACT THAT SNAKES HAVE NEVER

SO HERE’S THE DEAL, IRELAND WAS TOO COLD
FOR ANY REPTILE SPECIES UNTIL THE LAST ICE

AGE ENDED ABOUT 10,000 YEARS AGO. AT THAT
TIME, SOME SNAKE SPECIES BEGAN INHABITING

NORTHERN AND WESTERN EUROPE, BUT IRELAND HAD
ALREADY BROKEN OFF FROM THOSE REGIONS 2,000

YEARS PRIOR. A SNAKE WOULD HAVE HAD TO CROSS
12 MILES OF FRIGID OCEAN WATER TO GET TO THE

EMERALD ISLE, SO YOU CAN SEE WHY NO SNAKES
HAVE MADE THE JOURNEY.

SOOOO THAT’S WHY THERE’S NO SNAKES IN
IRELAND LADDY! DON’T TRY AND FIND NO SNAKES
ON THE IRISH PLAINS BECAUSE THERE AIN'T ANY.

title: Why Are There No Snakes In Ireland?
